title: From Camp to Code: Queerness in Cuba
itunes:title: From Camp to Code: Queerness in Cuba
description:
Chris and Gare talk with Cuban historian Andres Pertierra about how Cuba went from putting gay people in work camps to progressive legal reform

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
